Tests

// WORKING

byte readings[48] = {
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,

	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,

	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,

};

// Every stack is red

-------------------------------------------------------------------

// WORKING

byte readings[48] = {
	B01000000, B01000000, B01000000, B01000000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,

	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,

	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,

};

// Stack : 1
// G G G G
// Everything else is red

-------------------------------------------------------------------

// ONLY WORKS IF I PRINT STUFF

byte readings[48] = {
	B00100000, B00100000, B00100000, B00100000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,

	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,

	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,

};

// Stack : 1
// B B B B
// Everything else is red
// NOT WORKING

-------------------------------------------------------------------

// WORKS IF I PRINT STUFF

byte readings[48] = {
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B01000000, B01000000, B01000000, B01000000,
	B00100000, B00100000, B00100000, B00100000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,

	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,

	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,

};

// Stack : 2 
// G G G G 
// Stack : 3
// B B B B
// Everything else is red

-------------------------------------------------------------------

// TO BE CHECKED

byte readings[48] = {
	B01000000, B00100000, B01000000, B00100000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B01000000, B10010000, B00100000, B00100000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,

	B00100000, B00100000, B10010000, B01000000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B01000000, B01000000, B00100000, B00100000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,

	B00100000, B00100000, B01000000, B01000000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B00100000, B00100000, B00100000, B00100000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,

};

// Stack : 1
// G B G B
// Stack : 3
// G R B B
// Stack : 5
// B B R G
// Stack : 7
// G G B B
// Stack : 9
// B B G G
// Stack : 11
// B B B B
// Everything else is red
-------------------------------------------------------------------

// TO BE CHECKED

byte readings[48] = {
	B00100000, B00100000, B00100000, B00100000,
	B01000000, B01000000, B01000000, B01000000,
	B00100000, B00100000, B00100000, B00100000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,

	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,

	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,
	B10010000, B10010000, B10010000, B10010000,

};

// Stack : 1
// G B R G
// Stack : 2
// R G G G
// Stack : 3
// B B B B
// Stack : 4
// G G G G

// Stack : 5
// R R R R
// Stack : 6
// B R G G 
// Stack : 7
// G B R B
// Stack : 8
// B B B B

// Stack : 1
// G B R G
// Stack : 2
// R G G G
// Stack : 3
// B B B B
// Stack : 4
// G G G G
